生悟り: (なまさとり) - incomplete enlightenment; incompletely enlightened person
生意気: (なまいき) - impertinent; saucy; cheeky; conceit; audacious; brazen
生態: (せいたい) - mode of life/ecology; (animal) territory
生成子完全集合: (せいせいしかんぜんしゅうごう) - complete generator set
生成子部分集合: (せいせいしぶぶんしゅうごう) - partial generator set
生成文法: (せいせいぶんぽう) - generative grammar
生捕る: (いけどる) - to capture alive; to take prisoner; to catch alive
生掘り: (なまほり) - bareback sex (esp. male gay); unprotected sex
生揚げ: (なまあげ) - deep-fried bean curd; undercooked
生春巻: (なまはるまき) - fresh spring roll (i.e. not fried); summer roll; Vietnamese salad roll
生春巻き: (なまはるまき) - fresh spring roll (i.e. not fried); summer roll; Vietnamese salad roll
生有: (しょうう) - the instant of birth (rebirth)
生有る者は必ず死有り: (せいあるものはかならずしあり) - No mortal escapes death
生来: (しょうらい) - naturally; by nature (birth); congenitally
生権力: (せいけんりょく) - biopower; Foucault's term for the regulation by modern states of their subjects
生死: (しょうじ) - life and death; (しょうし, しょうじ only)  samsara (cycle of death and rebirth); (しょうし, しょうじ only) death
生死にかかわる問題: (せいしにかかわるもんだい) - a matter of life and death
生死の境: (せいしのさかい) - between life and death
生死一如: (せいしいちにょ) - (yoji) Life and death are the two faces of the same coin
生死流転: (しょうじるてん) - (yoji) all things being in flux through the endless circle of birth, death, and rebirth; the circle of transmigration
生死観: (せいしかん) - one's opinion on life and death; life-and-death issue (e.g. in religion)
生死輪廻: (せいしりんね) - (yoji) all things being in flux through the endless circle of birth, death, and rebirth; the circle of transmigration
生殖器: (せいしょくき) - genital organ; genitalia; sexual organ; reproductive organ
生殖器官: (せいしょくきかん) - reproductive organ; reproductive system
生殖工学: (せいしょくこうがく) - reproduction technology
生殖機能: (せいしょくきのう) - reproductive function
生殖的隔離: (せいしょくてきかくり) - reproductive isolation
生殖細胞: (せいしょくさいぼう) - germ cell; reproductive cell
生殖能力: (せいしょくのうりょく) - reproductive capability; fertility; fecundity; biotic potential
生殖腺刺激ホルモン: (せいしょくせんしげきホルモン) - gonadotropic hormone (gonadotrophic)
生殖補助技術: (せいしょくほじょぎじゅつ) - assisted reproductive technology; ART
生殺: (せいさつ) - sparing life and taking life; letting live and killing
生毛: (うぶげ) - soft, downy hair (i.e. such as on one's cheek)/peach fuzz/fluff/pappus; lanugo; lanuginous/pappose/pappous
生毛体: (せいもうたい) - basal body; basal granule; kinetosome; blepharoplast
生気: (せいき) - life; vitality; verve; vigor; vigour; animation; spirit
生気溌剌: (せいきはつらつ) - (yoji) being full of vitality; being vivacious
生汗: (なまあせ) - sweat caused by fear, stress, etc.
生没年: (せいぼつねん) - dates of birth and death
生活: (seikatsu) - living, life (a existência diária de alguém), livelihood
生活にめりはりをつける: (せいかつにめりはりをつける) - to vary the pace of one's life
生活に困る: (せいかつにこまる) - to live in want
生活の資: (せいかつのし) - means of living
生活を送る: (せいかつをおくる) - to lead (a) life (usu. preceded by the type of life)
生活不安: (せいかつふあん) - (yoji) worry (uncertainty, uneasiness, insecurity) about one's life (future)
生活保護: (せいかつほご) - livelihood protection; public assistance; welfare
生活保護法: (せいかつほごほう) - Livelihood Protection Law
生活信条: (せいかつしんじょう) - (yoji) one's philosophy of life
生活力: (せいかつりょく) - vitality; ability to earn a living
生活協同組合: (せいかつきょうどうくみあい) - a cooperative
生活反応: (せいかつはんのう) - vital reaction
生活史: (せいかつし) - life cycle; life history
生活圏: (せいかつけん) - sphere of daily existence
生活年齢: (せいかつねんれい) - chronological age
生活必需品: (せいかつひつじゅひん) - daily (living) necessities; necessities; essentials for life
生活感: (せいかつかん) - lived-in feel (e.g. a room)
生活振り: (せいかつぶり) - way of life
生活支援: (せいかつしえん) - livelihood support; maintenance
生活文化: (せいかつぶんか) - culture of everyday life
生活様式: (せいかつようしき) - one's lifestyle
生活残業: (せいかつざんぎょう) - (yoji) (working) overtime to make ends meet (to support one's lifestyle)
生活水準: (せいかつすいじゅん) - standard of living
生活法: (せいかつほう) - art of living; way of life
生活物資: (せいかつぶっし) - living necessities; everyday commodities; daily commodities; everyday goods; subsistence goods
